resources.string: Hey! I\'m cookie, delivering fancy interactive messages on Android since 2017.
This is a top cookie with an icon.
This is a bottom cookie with an icon and an action. Nice right?
Fancy animations will make your cookies super exciting.
This is the default plain cookie
This is an extra large cookie

Cookies can be extra large!
